attributes.action: To order a full public enquiry into the events of 9-11,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British relatives of those who were killed on September the 11th 2001 deserve a full British Enquiry into the incident. The terrible events of that day shook the world. Numerous experts have argued that the official story does not add up, Many books such as “The New Pearl Harbour” have made certain aspects of the official story seem false. Previous petitions on this issue have been raised before but the PM has not responded to these
